threat: A remote attacker could possibly use this flaw with a specially-crafted URI to bypass security constraint checks.
A remote attacker could possibly use this flaw to bypass the cross-site request forgery protection.
A remote attacker could use this flaw to cause Tomcat to stop responsing, resulting in a denial of service.
special:
The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:
In general, a standard system update will make all the necessary changes.
